website_summaries.verdict: Nicely mixes power and price to deliver a fast-performing rig that’s made for VR, as well as other high-end general computing tasks.
pros: Delivers excellent overclocking performance in the CPU
Ships with fun case lighting that gamers can control
cons: Not the most powerful setup for seamless VR performance, so you may need to add some RAM right away

customer_reviews.title: Not connecting to monitor
customer_reviews.text: Monitor not getting signal from PC. Monitor works on other devices, just not on this PC. Contacted customer service, but had some confusion. Thought it was a ram problem, but think its something wrong with motherboard or graphic card. Pretty difficult to dissemble the PC to figure out why connection with monitor is not working since its prebuilt. Will prob contact a technician soon. Also, my PC seems to be a different version from the one showcased in the manual as there was no packaging inside the case. Easy to set up though, but mine isn't working despite setting it up. Hope my problem is resolved soon. Will update.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Value for Great Performance
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I just got it and have had no problems out of the box. I quoted all of the components separately and i saved $200 as opposed to building this myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding PC terrible company.
customer_reviews.text: I have had it over a week and it has been great. Very quite. Great value. Incredible components. The reason for the 3 stars is because they promise a gift (probably worthless) for a great review. Gave them a great review and since they lied, I had to update it and give them 3 stars. I should give them a lower one, but I'm being very generous today.
customer_reviews.author: J. Charkas

customer_reviews.title: Misleading info
customer_reviews.text: I got this PC and everything works face-value but after digging I noticed that the windows system was not successfully integrated. I paid good money for this system and i need a good OS because i run it for school as well. 0xc004f025 is the error i get when i try to enter my product key...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a great system.
customer_reviews.text: This desktop is a powerhouse of a machine for the pricing displayed. I was amazed with how easy it was to set up and then get running, there wasn't a disk tray, so I was worried about the drivers, but they were installed when the PC was powered on. I had a question on the machine, and it looks like the motherboard supports 4 RAM spots for upgrades, and I think the maximum support for the PC is 128GB, that is what I found, but make sure on crucial or another website. All in all, a great buy for the money, and I couldn't be more satisfied, the speed and reliability is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great price for its capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Great specs (16 gb ram, 1660 Ti gpu, i7-9700F cpu) for its price; it can play most of the games I throw at it at high settings at > 80 fps. Looks nice with all the different colored lights, easy to set up. Can't complain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gamer/Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Computer came packed nicely from Amazon. All parts were there, including keyboard and mouse, connection cables. Fired it up right out of the box no problems. Downloaded WOT (world of tanks) and could not believe the improvement in the game look and feel. I was running on lowest resolution with previous computer, frame rate was 55 to 60 and ping of 38. With new computer frame rate was 200+ with same ping running in Ultra mode. Game looks so much different. Plenty of cooling and the fans run really quietly. Looks amazing. Wife who is not into gaming even noticed WOT looked so much better.
customer_reviews.author: kb5xg

customer_reviews.title: Sound jack on back didn't work, Called technical support, Easy fix.
customer_reviews.text: The solution was simple. Right click on the little sound icon in the lower right. From here you can choose where the sound is outputted. On my new computer it was under Playback. The older one is under Output. Hope this helps. It turned out the sound was being sent to my speaker-less monitor thru the hdmi cable and needed to be switched to my speakers. I like this computer just fine so far. Will update if anything changes. Technical support was easy to use and according to the box, good for the life of the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth King

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming pc, but........
customer_reviews.text: This rig plays my racing sims well on Ultra! Only problem i had was that Amazon said it had 7.1 audio, it didn't. Amazon took care of the problem so it's a non issue for me. ibuypower has good service as well. EDIT! I was supposed to receive a 10.00 Amazon gift card towards a game and ibuypower did NOT follow through. Where's my 10.00 ibuypower?
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Computer!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased another gaming computer for Christmas and it had so many issues we ended up having to return it. I was a little hesitant to take a chance on another one but the reviews convinced me. So glad we gave it a try. It was super easy to set up and my son has been playing fortnite and minecraft nonstop since we got it. Very fast and good graphics. I'd give it 5 stars but my one complaint is that the bottom fan isn't lighting up. We're going to work on fixing that today. Otherwise this has been a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: KRG

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time or money
customer_reviews.text: System crashes all the time and isn’t compatible with a lot of programs. If it was within the 30 days I would return.
customer_reviews.author: TJeff

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this computer for couple of weeks now and got to test out most of my games at High-Very High settings on 1080p. Shadow of the tomb raider- Very High 80 fps Rainbow 6- Very high 120+ Fps For honor- Maxed 80-100 fps black desert online- Remastered graphics 60 fps Those are the main games I got to test and play while having this computer. I really recommend getting this specially if it's on sale. GTA V- 70-80 Maxed
customer_reviews.author: Sami Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: I AM SOOOOO HAPPY WITH MY NEW COMPUTER! VERY GOOD PRICE FOR HOW POWERFUL IT IS
customer_reviews.text: I had my leveno gaming laptop for 6 years and i needed a new computer to keep up hardcore gaming friends it works SMOOTHLY AND I HAVE NO ISSUES!!! i love how when the time comes i can even add parts and how easy it is to take off the glass! everything was so easy to set up to! i will differently recommend this computer to anyone who asks! its a great starter computer if you want to add parts yourself and not deal with building it from scratch! it quick to shut down and everything loads up super FAST AND SMOOTH!!! i am a very HAPPY CUSTOMERS AND WILL RECOMMEND TO THOSE WHO WATCH MY STREAM!
customer_reviews.author: samuella

customer_reviews.title: The price is too generous!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my old PC had burned out. This machine was only $300 more expensive than the other PC I had and works 10x better in every category! My gaming is so smooth and enjoyable, and I put this machine’s strength to the test. It can run just about any game I own at max settings, even more intensive games like Arma 3, Dying Light, Assassins Creed: Odyssey, the list goes on! The LED’s put on a beautiful show while I’m gaming also. It’s an overall amazing product if you’re looking for a reliable and hardy PC for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Olga B.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: The value for this was great, I picked it up for $999. I built my last PC in 2015 and typically go that route, but after comparing cost, labor and the possible hassle of dealing with multiple manufacturers if problems arise. I decided to get this pre-built. I've run APEX, Overwatch and the COD: Modern Warfare Beta at max settings without any issues. I don't care for all the LED lights, luckily all that is easily turned off. Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Case looks great and performs well
customer_reviews.text: The case looks great, the system performs well, and we get a kick out of the lighting (you can set it to strobe to sound). I took/included a picture of the back of the PC as I did not see any others.
customer_reviews.author: netwebdave

customer_reviews.title: Solid gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: I have now used this computer for a little over two months, and I can say that my experience with it has been entirely solid. No bluescreens, very reliable, stylish look, and responsive on the several CPU intensive games I've played. I was wary at first because the price seemed low for the overall power of the machine and for what I'd been prepared to spend to replace my custom-built gaming PC that had just died for good, but I've been very pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lischke

customer_reviews.title: Blue Tooth does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: Attempting to pair a wireless XBone controller doesnt work, even with latest updates. I was able to easily pair the controller with a laptop, so it is clearly the desktop setup. The computer is powerful and does what I need - other than the BT functionality.
customer_reviews.author: T.Evo

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with ibuypower product and it is good so far. Not to mention "made in the USA", the order was delivered on time. Set up was easy, thanks for very good instructions. We had some issues with the keyboard, but it was resolved quickly by support team. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and operating system is very fast.
customer_reviews.text: Setting up this computer was basically plug and play. I bought it because I thought it would be very fast and I have not been disappointed. Amazon shipped it the day I bought it and I had it up and running in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I need a answer about the desk top, or get another one.
customer_reviews.text: I had return the desk top a 1 week ago because it was not working properly. So since then, I did not get any information or my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Rosiney Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience
customer_reviews.text: The computer is terrible. When it was finally received 3 weeks after the original delivery date. I opened it up plugged it in and it froze. And kept freezing. Would not load windows. Finally after 8 tried it starts. After 45 min of use it turns off. And this happened many times. The keyboard had 3 broken keys and worst part it would play the PC games I have. I feel as if this was owned by someone else they returned it and iBuyPower just sent it to me. I am very disappointed. This was my first time buy a real high powered gaming PC and it's just one big disappment.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to see this was missing the remote for the case. It was not easy to get to the cabling to get another hard drive added to the case. The keyboard and mouse seem cheaply made. The case is very pretty once its powered on, and it runs great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun A. Whitehorse

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a starter pc
customer_reviews.text: The PC itself plays great but the mouse and keyboard are terrible. The keys stick and get stuck often, even when I used it for typing/non gaming. The mouse has weird DPI controls and is not very clear on your DPI settings. The specs on the tower are good and it plays games fine but had to drop and extra $200-300 for better equipment, which, while expected, wasn’t great as the key/mouse are quite bad
customer_reviews.author: James Macapagal

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different Model.
customer_reviews.text: Video card and CPU borderline overheating . 1660ti has a poor cooling capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I buy power
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up.. come within two business day with amazon prime A good way to start a new desktop and upgrade from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Leung

customer_reviews.title: A deal
customer_reviews.text: I love this product have been wanting a gaming computer for awhile. I didn’t trust myself to build and looking into the parts it made more sense to purchase this. It is less expensive to buy this then parts in it and do yourself
customer_reviews.author: Ben Julian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: This not a 4k 144hz gaming behemoth. But it is a beast at 1080p, and totally adequate for 1440p - which is phenomenal for the price. The case looks good, the LEDs can be turned off, and the fans are very quiet. Zero issues with setup. Couldn't be happier with this rig so far.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Good but no plug and play
customer_reviews.text: So it says no drivers to install..not true and bluetooth doesnt work correctly..integrity of windows was corrupted so had to download a different version to the system. Thank God I know enough about computers to fix those issues. Case is nice keyboard and mouse are as well. But definitely check for updates in drivers or the right drivers. And bluetooth I just li etc. Go and hooked up speaker to back didn't feel like sending back again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow Connection
customer_reviews.text: Of course like everyone else who has purchased this product, I used this computer for gaming. Out of the box I figured everything was fine and nothing was wrong. Quickly when I had powered it up and started to try and download some games, I noticed download times were very slow! At first I thought it was my wifi so I tried moving my router closer (I do not have Ethernet) and that didn’t solve my problem. I had done some research and found nothing that helped. I resided with the fact that my computer had a defect. Did anyone else have this problem?
customer_reviews.author: Errol Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the person who can’t drop 2k
customer_reviews.text: This was a good buy for a great starting point. It was easy to set up and get running. It ran every game right out of the box. Fortnite, PUBG, Apex and WOW. I have added new parts scenes buy this pc and it accommodated every part. New Nvidia GeForce 2070 video card, Internal SSD M.2. card and 900w power supply. It still a work in progress but like I said, it was a great starting point for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: painfully slow
customer_reviews.text: This computer has painfully slow start up. I cannot do even mundane tasks like editing a pdf file with adobe acrobat. I wish I could return it but the return period has expired. Not worth the nearly fourteen *100 that I paid. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MediocrityX

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: This was quite an upgrade from my previous desktop. The specs are just as advertised and it is very quite. It does not come with a remote, but it doesn't really need one to work. As others have mentioned, it does have a sticker on the side of the glass panel that is somewhat difficult to remove, but after using a razor blade and some Windex it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer while it was on sale on Labor Day. My only complaint is that the LED bar on the top keeps falling down. Nothing a little tape couldn’t fix but it was a bit annoying at first. Overall I love this computer and I have no problems running any games from Rocket League to Civ 5 to Borderlands 3.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Walters

customer_reviews.title: excellent PC!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching new PC for 2 days and found this. Good price for the spec.... Wow. This is super fast and strong... Much better than my old one(Ryzen 5 + RX550 + 16GB + 250SSD) I tested several games & movies, outstanding performances... I recommend this PC.
customer_reviews.author: yoonjoung

customer_reviews.title: Everything you signed up for
customer_reviews.text: This is everything you can expect. It was missing the wifi antenna and I wasnt able to use it too much without a strong internet connection. I still rate this 4 stars because it is very fast and responsive. Customer service was very helpful and the antenna is currently on it's way. I cannot wait to use this desktop to its maximum capacity!
customer_reviews.author: MARIO

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Product & No Support
customer_reviews.text: The machine came with many defects: 1) One of the USB slots not responding. 2) Few HDMI slots not responding. 3) One out of four memory card slots not responding. 4) Windows Activation does not work. I called iBuyPower directly, but they are not helping. I bought this machine for work and I cannot work!
customer_reviews.author: CalebCho

customer_reviews.title: Solid, strong, and effortless to operate.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with the system so far. When it arrived, all it took was adding the included wi-fi antennas and checking inside the case for any unplugged cables. Zero bloatware after setup, too. Typically it powers on and boots up in less than fifteen seconds. I'm not the most hardcore gamer, so the biggest test for the system so far has been Rocket League, and that stably runs on the highest settings. I wouldn't call the price for this entry-level, but I can say so far it's lived up to expectations.
customer_reviews.author: K. T.

customer_reviews.title: sweet deal.
customer_reviews.text: i went through two new computers that didn't work out the box. this one on the other hand has preformed extremely well. the case and rbg light are awesome . the fan can be a little noisy sometimes but nothing extreme.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product straight out of the box easy set up packaged well
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I made this purchase got the I nine series super fast,gaming is great, everything works great straight out of the box would recommend this PC to anybody that asks and I have to say it really looks good especially with all my accessories Great machine
customer_reviews.author: Keith Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Worst computer
customer_reviews.text: Do not even think about buying this computer. I have already returned once and I have spent more than 8 hours with tech support On the phone without any positive progress. Amazon now is refusing to return the computer and the manufacture is not doing anything. Do waste your money on this computer.
customer_reviews.author: LARBI EJJAKI

customer_reviews.title: Fast Machine
customer_reviews.text: Love the desktop computer but the keyboard and mouse feel and look cheap. I'll be replacing them soon with a better set. Definitely love the computer though.
customer_reviews.author: Valentino Nickel

customer_reviews.title: Great System
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly out of the box! Super easy to set up. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. L.

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious rig for the price. I've never been one to build my own, and i prefer something ready to go right out of a box. My previous PC was an Alienware X51 so this is a huge upgrade. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erik S.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds the published specs.
customer_reviews.text: This computer is perfect for all my games and applications. iBUYPOWER upgraded it beyond the published specifications.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pc
customer_reviews.text: Love this PC especially for the low price. This is actually my 2nd one. The 1st one I had to return due to it not working. So far this one is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Ritts

customer_reviews.title: Came defective and got my refund
customer_reviews.text: Came defective and didn’t even bother getting it replaced. Just got my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Isai Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great computer especially for the cost can’t build it any cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Product came packaged well. Looks good and all the lights work great. Keyboard and mouse work well I don’t know why everyone says they are cheap. Plays all the games I have tried to play on ultra graphics and spent miss a beat! The only thing I’d have to say I disliked was the fact that they put the warning sticker for it being tempered glass right on the glass but with some rubbing alcohol was able to get it all off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely worth its price. With i7-9700f CPU and 1600 Ti GPU, you can run 99% of the games smoothly. Also has a cool looking if you are looking for a fancy one. Most importantly, you only need a monitor to use this thing immediately. Definitely one of the best purchases in my life!
customer_reviews.author: Haoyan Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Good Computer Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine a month ago to replace a custom built computer running Windows 7 that was 10 years old. This computer is much quieter than my old machine and was great right out of the box. I didn't like the feel of the IBUYPOWER keyboard or mouse included with the set, but that is a minor drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn. L. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Day 2 - CPU Overtemperature error
customer_reviews.text: Literally not cool. Returning it went OK except I had to build a box for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dude McGnarley

customer_reviews.title: Economical gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: Nice roomy case. Cool lights. Great specs: processor, ram, hd, ssd, video card etc. plays games well, high FPS
customer_reviews.author: Alan Nasar

customer_reviews.title: so fast
customer_reviews.text: this computer is so fast and was so easy to set up. keyboard and mouse are included LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely packaged and it looked very secured. It was very easy to set up and everything is running smoothly. I really like how the computer is not loaded with bloatware which is a plus. I am new to the custom computer scene and overall very satisfied with this purchased and I made a wishlist of what I want and this computer exceeded everything I wanted with a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Chance Riley

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this PC because it seemed like a great price for the specs. Upon arrival I was pretty satisfied with packaging. My only concern was that the back panel of the motherboard was loose and popped inward. But easy fix. I booted up and downloaded a few games. Runs great. Temps great. And is a very quiet machine.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great performance within the $1000 budget and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Let’s start with the bad, 3 months into ownership power supply failed. Promptly called tech support and they required me to send the pc to them in California and they performed a diagnosis and fixed the issues. No questions or run arounds was very satisfied with the customer service I received.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Working well too bulky. I personally do not like the color led which making annoy.
customer_reviews.author: lan

customer_reviews.title: IBUYPOWER = I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Omg , name IBUYPOWER, how about I will buy again!!! Love this machine , it’s quiet , powerful and should be classified as a lethal gaming weapon
customer_reviews.author: JOR-EL & CUBBY EL

customer_reviews.title: Good Intro Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to replace my ancient laptop I've been using for school. Works great, looks fantastic, and has not given me any trouble so far. Excellent introductory gaming computer, and the case is large enough to add upgrades or modifications later. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Flameboy580

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this PC so far. Fast delivery, easy set up and definitely plug and play. Huge upgrade from my previous PC. Plus all the lights with a clear side panel look awesome. Very quiet and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Ford

customer_reviews.title: Good Price pretty machine
customer_reviews.text: great price for what's inside the machine. nice glass cover looks slick and good. might come back for the extra star if everything's good.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Chuk

customer_reviews.title: Solid price
customer_reviews.text: All in all its a great price for the components specifically the GPU and CPU, and the Mobo, ssd and ram are all cheaper variations to get their price point lower, mine did have a scratch on the front but works effortlessly across the few games I've thrown at it.
customer_reviews.author: the_dude

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying a gaming pc and it works out awesomely. setup was extremely easy. 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: ShesAbsolutelyAmazing

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a powerful gaming computer!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome computer, superb value. I'd leave five stars, but the first one I was shipped was a refurbished model that quickly overheated every time I started it up, so that was a bit of a hassle. They gave me a shipping label to return it, however, and the new one I received works like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Paul L

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile Investment!!
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging....F A S T system...worth every penny. Looks great and runs even better. Setup was a breeze. Get it!!
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: This Pc is very good for gaming and the price 👌.
customer_reviews.text: This Pc have good components for a good price. Fornite 200-300 FPS All Low. And other games similar.
customer_reviews.author: MIRLEY BUJAN CARREÑO

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We had several issues from the beginning. My son turned it on and was not able to access the desktop at all. Had to take it to Best Buy and they had to wipe it and reinstall Windows. Three trips to the Geek Squad later, and things appear to be working ok for now.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gietzen

customer_reviews.title: Great PC
customer_reviews.text: Had this PC for about a month and I can say for sure that it works great! It can run a lot of games to it's fullest potential in mid-high settings. My only qualm with this PC is that the back part of the motherboard was bent when it came in, but I was able to bend it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good for value
customer_reviews.text: Insane power. This is my first gaming pc and I am not disappointed. Specs and features are worth the value to play fairly high ended games, think it will last me around 5 years or so.
customer_reviews.author: Duy M.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: So quiet, so clean, so FAST! Best product in its class
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: FAST!!  EASY SET UP!
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming computer for my son. His first one! Great for games and for school work! Super power and fast downloads! Thanks for a great experience!
customer_reviews.author: korbam

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup, good specs
customer_reviews.text: Meets Cyberpunk 2077's specs almost out of the box (Video Card needed a driver update). Initial setup is so easy a 13 year old could do it. Why it's actually 4.99/5 stars: LEDs stay on even while turned off. You have to go into BIOS and tell the system to go into deep sleep on power off
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Does the job I needed
customer_reviews.text: Looking and found this as he best deal for what I’m looking for, playing LoL and classic WoW. Found this PC had all I needed. Ordered it got it the next day and has been great. No issues. When my kids get older and want to play I’ll be getting more PC from them
customer_reviews.author: david sokoloski

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son's birthday and he is extremely happy with it. Love that we can add storage and RAM. Set up was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: couldnt be happier
customer_reviews.text: was looking into doing a build and with what I wanted this company was able to help me out without breaking the bank. you guys are a gamers dream come true and will highly recommend to my friends
customer_reviews.author: kenneth taylor

customer_reviews.title: Plug n Play!
customer_reviews.text: Open the box, remove the packing, plug it in, and DONE!!! Ready to play in minutes. Looks beautiful, connections were secure, and the keyboard and mouse are more than adequate. no cables to hook to monitor though, make sure to have those already.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this computer yesterday. Unboxed and ready a game after just a few quick downloads. PC runs smooth, fast, quite, and overall is an amazing deal. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome computer!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome computer! I'd recommend even as home pc rather than gaming... it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SPM

customer_reviews.title: An Awesome PC
customer_reviews.text: I love my new PC runs very cool can;t hear it running looks great, I'm very happy
customer_reviews.author: Randy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for price
customer_reviews.text: Very good computer, I didn't know about that brand before but it's a good surprise. My son loves his new computer. Very good service, he just connected it to his screens and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Philippe Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My first gaming pc.
customer_reviews.text: I just pulled it out of the box. It was packed very well. Very easy to set up. About to start downloading some games I play. I will update this review as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Martinez

customer_reviews.title: A great gaming pc with reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This desktop has a very good-looking case with rgb. It works well and i think i buy the right one.The reason why i reduce a star for it is one of my RGB fans is not on,the fan is working but has no light,which makes me a bit of sad.Anyway,i think it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Blue.Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome computer
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming computer, can't beat it for the price. The only thing that sucked was I bought one and a week later I bought another and it was $50 less, if I'd known that I would have bought both on second week and save $100 instead of $50

customer_reviews.title: Super Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this computer. It has no problem opening any of my programs that I use and it opens them really quick. It is also so quite that I don't even hear it running.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Really great buy! Came in nicely packaged and delieverd very well. I would recommend this for your first starter PC vecause it was my first. Great bang for your buck.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful computer that worked right away. RGB lights look great and it’s pretty quiet while also staying cool. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.text: Can’t say anything about tech support because machine works perfectly. Fast as hell, no lag at all and hits 790 mbps no problem.

customer_reviews.text: Not an expert on PCs, but this was an easy setup and within my budget to be able to stream and game. Definitely worth the upgrade.

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no complaints. It was safely delivered, set up, updated, and has been stellar ever since. Couldn’t be more satisfied with this purchase.

product_meta.title: iBUYPOWER Gaming PC Computer Desktop Element 9260 (Intel Core i7-9700F 3.0Ghz, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 6GB, 16GB DDR4, 240GB SSD, 1TB HDD, WiFi & Windows 10 Home) Black
product_meta.description: Style:i7 9700F| Pattern Name:Desktop ElementExperience outstanding high performance from this Intel-powered iBUYPOWER gaming desktop PC. Whether you are looking for intense gaming, entertainment, streaming, content creation, research, or multitasking, this desktop tower rig will take you there! Our gaming computers are packed with powerful processing power & latest graphics, you will be able to tackle on tasks & system intensive programs quickly and efficiently without any lag time. This iBUYPOWER desktop tower is powered by an Intel Core i7-9700F Processor – designed for performance and reliability. This Ultra Gaming Desktop rig offers immersive graphics powered by NVIDIA's GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 6GB dedicated graphics card that will surely enhance your experience whether it is for your personal, gaming, or business needs. 16GB DDR4 will allow your PC to perform at fast optimal speeds with higher FPS in games. Experience with ease system-intensive applications and multitasking in streaming, video editing, or intense gaming. This computer comes with a 1TB SATA III hard drive and 240GB SSD that provides ample storage for all your favorite games and content. Equip yourself with this powerful gaming desktop and enjoy most demanding and popular games on the market today! *All iBUYPOWER Systems include 1-year parts . *Lifetime technical support - Our exceptional support connects our customers to our dedicated customer service specialists and top-notch support technicians who are experts in their field.
